message: I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my initial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $900000. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000.

I'm starting to think we're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair deal. I can offer it to you for $920000. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $880000.

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far away from my initial price. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I can offer it to you for $915000. This is my last offer, Bob. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to explore other options.
I understand your concerns, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $890000.
